message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
You'll get a small share, but I'll give you a chance to negotiate
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of negotiating with you!
You're being greedy, but I'll give you a decent offer
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve more for taking the lead in negotiations!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control now
I'm not desperate, I'm just smart. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting close to losing everything, take it or leave it
This is my final offer. I've been generous and flexible, but I'm not going to accept anything less than this. Take it or leave it!
You're out of options, take the scraps or walk away with nothing
